job.title: Sr. Software Engineer
job.description: pJob Summary ppbr ppWhistic is growing and were looking for an experienced Sr Software Engineer FullStack to join our Engineering team You are joining Whistic at an exciting time You have the ability to come in and have a large impact on the continued development of the Whistic platform ppYou will be responsible for developing vertical slices of functionality across all phases of the product development cycle Youll also have the opportunity to shape and execute exciting projects Our engineers need to be versatile display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the fullstack as we continue to push technology forward ppnbsp ppKey Responsibilities nbsp pbrullipDevelop software solutions by studying information needs conferring with users studying systems flow data usage and work processes investigating problem areas following the software development lifecycle plilipDetermine operational feasibility by evaluating analysis problem definition requirements solution development and proposed solutions plilipDocument and demonstrate solutions by developing documentation flowcharts layouts diagrams charts code comments and clear code plilipPrepare and install solutions by determining and designing system specifications standards and programming plilipImprove operations by conducting systems analysis recommending changes in policies and procedures plilipUpdate job knowledge by studying stateoftheart development tools programming techniques and computing equipment participating in educational opportunities reading professional publications maintaining personal networks participating in professional organizations plilipProtect operations by keeping information confidential plilipProvide information by collecting analyzing and summarizing development and service issues plilipAccomplish engineering and organization mission by completing related results as needed plilipSupport and develop peer engineers by providing advice coaching and mentorship opportunities pliulpnbsp ppTech Qualifications ppbr pullipJava 8 Spring Boot 15 Spring Data REST Angular Javascript JSON XML Jenkins SQL plilipEnterprise Systems microServices SaaS plilipAWS preferred pliulpbr ppOther Skills and Qualifications pbrullipAt least 7 years of proven experience as a Software Engineer or Developer plilipBachelors Degree in Computer Science or related preferred plilipTech startup experience preferred plilipAnalyzing Information plilipSoftware design documentation and testing plilipAbility to work in a team environment plilipSoftware Development process and  fundamentals plilipSoftware architecture pliulpbr ppBenefits ppbr pullipStock options plilipMedical dental and vision insurance benefit plilipPaid parental leave plilip401K plilipCompetitive salary and bonus plilip16 Paid Holidays plilip15 Days PTO plilip2 Whistic DNA Days plilipSummer Fridays pliulpnbsp ppAbout Whistic ppbr ppWhistic is on a mission to become the single source of trust for buyers and sellers by enabling companies to hold each other accountable for protecting their shared data Heres how it works When a company is seeking out a vendor that will have access to its sensitive data that company must assess the vendor to ensure it meets certain information security thresholds This assessment process results in cumbersome clunky and slow spreadsheets emailed back and forth back and fortheating up info security resources and ultimately delaying deals ppnbsp ppThats where Whistic comes in Our gamechanging 2sided platform enables security and sales teams to proactively conduct and respond to third party security assessments by streamlining and automating the process transforming the work for companies all over the world ppemnbspem ppemWhistic is an Equal Opportunity Employeremp
